DataElement.preferredName: Person Clinical Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Assessment Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._Having to do with the examination and treatment of patients._(sis-TEM-ik) Affecting the entire body._An autoimmune, connective tissue chronic inflammatory disorder affecting the skin, joints, kidneys, lungs, heart, and the peripheral blood cells. It is more commonly seen in women than men. Variants include discoid and systemic lupus erythematosus._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.

An autoimmune, connective tissue chronic inflammatory disorder affecting the skin, joints, kidneys, lungs, heart, and the peripheral blood cells. It is more commonly seen in women than men. Variants include discoid and systemic lupus erythematosus.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ReferenceDocuments.name: This measure is a clinical as
ReferenceDocuments.description: This measure is a clinical assessment of individuals with systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE, or lupus) to determine the level of organ damage due to the disease.

DataElement.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21
